article:
This is a list of animals that have been domesticated by humans. [http://archaeology.about.com/od/dterms/a/domestication.htm Animal
Domestication - Table of Dates and Places of Animal Domestication ]

{| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%; height:100px;"
